page.title: 09HOME LIFE
page.content: On Saturday morning I get up at about nine o'clock and make my mum and dad a drink and have some toast for my breakfast. I then get dressed and go to town with my mother. On Saturday the town is crowded. We go and come back from town by bus.On returning home I see my brother going off to work at the frozen food centre.After our dinner I watch television which is mostly sports programmes. After tea we play board and card games until bedtime. On Sunday morning my mum and dad get up first. When I get up I have a drink, I stay in my nightdress and play with my dog. Dinner is a family occasion when we usually have a roast meal. During the afternoon I usually watch television or talk to my brothers and parents until it is time to go to bed.
